item.description: You've worked all week so so it's time to have some fun at an outdoor Happy Hour with Party Express. It goes from 5:00 pm to 7:00 pm. Stonebridge offers a complimentary buffet Fridays. It can include, wings, b-b-q chicken, chicken tenders, pasta, and cheese covered potatoes. Their will also be special drink prices. The outside water view is quite picturesque. Any questions can be directed to Margaret the organizer of this event. We will decide during this happy hour where we will go for entertainment afterward.
item.how_to_find_us: Outside, under the tent, around the bar area

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Party Express goes to Friday night Happy Hour at Stonebridge
